br.com.extra.api.core
Interface CoreAPI

All Known Implementing Classes:
CoreAPIImpl, Orders, Products, SellerItems
public interface CoreAPI

ExtraAPI-SDK - CoreAPI.java Interface com as operações padrão para chamada aos Serviços REST.

Gibson Pasquini Nascimento, Fillipe Massuda 21/06/2013
